name: Sheepy's SchoolHouse The Evil Within
description:
"This is a Mod of Alex's Basics" Sheepy's Schoolhouse The Evil Within is a Most "Real" Horror Games Mod that It can be exist includes Gores, Strong Images, Loud Noises, and Jumpscares. In this mod, You encounter an Abandoned SchoolHouse and you must collect all 22 Old Notes to win

In-game Includes:
  • Gore & Blood.
  • Scary Jumpscares
  • Loud Noise
  • Nightmares. (That you'll have)
  • The Blood Mist
  • Disturbing Images.
CONTROLS W A S D - move Left Mouse Button - use selected item E - use object, use selected item on object or pickup item Q R - look from corner Left Shift - run END - restart level ESC - exit Mouse Wheel \ 1, 2, 3, 4 - select inventory slot Credits Modded By: Devilous Akito. Posters i used on twitter  BELONGS TO: Ineffable Special Inspiration Thanks To: LouisVsFrost. Sanspirate. LimeMetz. Ferikkusu and My Friends. Programs Tool: FL Studio. Kleki Gacha Club Websites: PNG Websites  Pinterests (posters) . . . If you don't know how to extract it download the zip file and select the zipped file and click the Right mouse button. and press extract all and then all you need to do is Go to the unzipped files and press "WindowsNoEditor"  and then click  MSITUA  and then if the white and red or alex's basics Default popped up. press the File Icon at the corner when your in the game    in the game and see the pack "Sheepy's Schoolhouse The Evil Within"  and click it and BOOM!  Enjoy :) STORY:  You Decided to Get to do stuff But you heard a door knock. and it's  Akito and His Co-Boss. James Cloride.  Told you. that there's a new job to get 22 Old notes and Papers. and then something isn't right
